scripts.start: npm run backend && npm run frontend && npm run stop-backend
scripts.backend-prod: cd backend && sudo docker compose up -d --build
scripts.stop-backend-prod: cd backend && sudo docker compose down
scripts.installs: npm install && cd TravelogUI2 && npm install
scripts.build-frontend-prod: cd TravelogUI2 && source .env.production && npm run build
scripts.serve-frontend-prod: cd TravelogUI2 && source .env.production && npm run serve
